results.message: This text input element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute, aria-label attribute, aria-labelledby attribute.

results.context: <input type="text" id="search_string" style="width:80px;" value="" onkeypress="return submitenter(this,event)">
results.message: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
